metadata.name: Haunting Of A Fragile Heart
metadata.description:
I envy those with gentle hearts, whose spirits dance like butterflies on life's tapestry, free from doubt and unrest. To them, the world of dreams unfurls as a treasured gift, a captivating sanctuary where every night reveals naught but celestial visions of pure ecstasy, entwined in the tender embrace of an aching soul.


Artist: Erik Witsoe
Digital Image
Open Edition 
Copyright remains with the creator.
